name: Bat Boy - (ZX Spectrum 48/128K)
description:
STORY

Gotham City is in danger again. The evil Joker-Bot army invaded the town and only Bat Boy can destroy them. Using its Batmobile and Batwing he will be able to get to all zones and defeat all enemies around Gotham. Jump, plane, crouch and shoot em up! 

STAGES

1 - Gotham Streets

2 - On the Road (Batmobile)

3 - 777 Factory

4 - The Art Museum

5 - Up In the air (Batwing)

6 - The Cathedral (Joker-Bot home)

CONTROLS

Keyboard: O: Go Left

P: Go Right 

Q: Jump / Plane

A: Crouch

SPACE: Fire

CREDITS

Code, Graphics & Music/FX: Antonio J. Pérez

Fixed Screens: Igor Errazking

Testing: Antxiko, Ed Verde, Volátil

Tools: 

  • Mojon Twins MK1 Engine
  • Sergio thEpOpE FX utility
  • SevenUp, WYZTracker, ZX-Paintbrush
  •  Z88DK, Notepad++

Special Thanks: Mojon Twins for the "Concurso Mojono" and all their wonderful engines and tools.

Physical Release: Matranet
